Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params._additionalParams: Additional parameters required for the condition check.
params._conditionIndex: The index of the condition within the position's close conditions.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the position can be closed.

closePosition(uint256,address,(uint256,(.details: Protocol will fall down (revert) if two conditions occur both: 1. (token1Price + position.depositedAmount).wdiv(positionDebt) will become lower than 1, so position will make loss for Protocol. 2. Not enough liquidity in bucket to pay that loss.

params._amountOutMin: minimum allowed amount out for position
params._dealReceiver: The receiver of the rest of trader's deposit.

params._ccmAdditionalParams: Additional params needed for canBeClosed() of the ConditionalClosingManager.
params._closeReason: The reason for closing the position.
params._conditionIndex: The index of the condition to be used for closing the position.
params._keeper: The address of the keeper or the recipient of the reward.
params._routes: An array of routes for executing trades, swap routes on dexes.

params._amount: The amount to decrease the deposit by.

params._bucket: The address of the bucket from which the position is to be deleted.
params._ids: The IDs of the positions to be deleted.
params._length: The length of the traders array.
params._traders: The addresses of the traders who owns the position.

doTransferOut(address,address,uint256).details: Only callable by the BATCH_MANAGER_ROLE role.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred.
params._to: The address to which the tokens will be transferred.
params._token: The address of the token to be transferred.

returns._0: The length of the positions array.
The number of positions the bucket has.

params._index: The index of the close condition.

returns._0: The close condition at the specified position and index.
An array of close conditions associated with the position.

params.assetA: The address of the first asset in the pair.
params.assetB: The address of the second asset in the pair.

returns._0: The oracle tolerable limit in WAD format (1 WAD = 100%) for the asset pair.

params._id: The ID of the position to retrieve.

returns._0: position The position information associated with the given ID.

params._index: The index of the position to retrieve.

returns._0: The Position struct at the specified index.
The debt of the position, measured in the same decimal format as debtTokens.
The number of positions the trader has.
The health value of the position in WAD format.

params._amount: The amount to increase the deposit by.
params._amountOutMin: The minimum amount of the output asset to receive from trading.
params._asset: The address of the asset to deposit.
params._positionId: The ID of the position to increase the deposit for.
params._routes: An array of routes to use for trading.
params._takeDepositFromWallet: A flag indicating whether to make the deposit immediately.

params._keeperRewardDistributor: The address of the KeeperRewardDistributor contract.
params._priceOracle: The address of the PriceOracle contract.
params._primexDNS: The address of the PrimexDNS contract.
params._registry: The address of the Registry contract.
params._traderBalanceVault: The address of the TraderBalanceVault contract.
params._whiteBlackList: The address of the WhiteBlacklist contract.

returns._0: A boolean indicating whether the position is delisted or not.

openPosition(((string,uint256,(uint256,(.details: Locks trader's collateral in TraderBalanceVault. Takes loan from bucket for deal. Makes swap bucket borrowedAsset amount on '_dex'. Updates rates and indexes in the '_bucket'. Mints debtToken for trader (msg.sender)

params._params: The parameters required to open a position.

openPositionByOrder((address,(address,ad.details: Only callable by the LOM_ROLE role.

params._params: The parameters for opening a position.

returns._0: The total borrowed amount, position amount, position ID, and entry price of the new position.

params._amount: The amount of the position asset to be closed from the position.
params._amountOutMin: The minimum amount to be received after swapping, measured in the same decimal format as the position's asset.
params._depositReceiver: The address where the remaining deposit will be sent.
params._positionId: The ID of the position to be partially closed.
params._routes: The routing information for swapping assets.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. This function can only be called by an address with the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setDefaultOracleTolerableLimit(uint256).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._percent: The new value for the default oracle tolerable limit. Measured in WAD (1 WAD = 100%).

setKeeperRewardDistributor(address).details: Only callable by the BIG_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._keeperRewardDistributor: The address of the KeeperRewardDistributor contract.

setMaintenanceBuffer(uint256).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role. The new maintenance buffer value should be greater than zero and less than one. Maintenance buffer is used in calculating the maximum leverage https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kR8eaqV4289MAbLKgIfKsZ2NgjFpeC0vpVL7jVUTvho/edit#bookmark=id.87oc1j1s9z21

params.newMaintenanceBuffer: The new value of the maintenance buffer in WAD format.

setMaxPositionSize(address,address,uint2.details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._amountInToken0: The maximum amount of token0 allowed in the position.
params._amountInToken1: The maximum amount of token1 allowed in the position.
params._token0: The address of the first token in the pair.
params._token1: The address of the second token in the pair.

setMinPositionSize(uint256,address).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._minPositionAsset: The address of the asset associated with the minimum position size.

setOracleTolerableLimit(address,address,.details: Only callable by the BIG_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._assetA: The address of the first asset.
params._assetB: The address of the second asset.
params._percent: The new value for the oracle tolerable limit between two assets. Measured in WAD (1 WAD = 100%).

setOracleTolerableLimitMultiplier(uint25.details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

setSecurityBuffer(uint256).details: Only callable by the MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role. 0 <= newSecurityBuffer < 1. Buffer security parameter is used in calculating the liquidation conditions https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kR8eaqV4289MAbLKgIfKsZ2NgjFpeC0vpVL7jVUTvho/edit#bookmark=id.i9v508hvrv42

params.newSecurityBuffer: The new value of the security buffer in WAD format.

setSpotTradingRewardDistributor(address).details: Only callable by the BIG_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role.

params._spotTradingRewardDistributor: The address of the SpotTradingRewardDistributor contract.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. This function can only be called by an address with the SMALL_TIMELOCK_ADMIN or MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role depending on the contract. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

updatePositionConditions(uint256,(uint25.details: The caller of this function must be the trader who owns the position.Emits an `UpdatePositionConditions` event upon successful update.

params._closeConditions: An array of close conditions for the position.
params._positionId: The ID of the position to update.

canBeClosed(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Checks if a position can be closed based on a specific condition.

closePosition(uint256,address,(uint256,(.notice: Close trader's active position or liquidate risky position.

closePositionByCondition(uint256,address.notice: Closes trader's active position by closing condition

decreaseDeposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Decreases the deposit amount for a given position.

deletePositions(uint256[],address[],uint.notice: Deletes a positions by their IDs from a specific bucket for a given traders.

doTransferOut(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from the contract to a specified address.

getAllPositionsLength().notice: Returns the length of the positions array.

getBucketPositionsLength(address).notice: Returns the length of the array containing the positions of a specific bucket.

getCloseCondition(uint256,uint256).notice: Retrieves the close condition for a given position and index.

getCloseConditions(uint256).notice: Retrieves the close conditions for a specific position.

getOracleTolerableLimit(address,address).notice: Returns the oracle tolerable limit for the given asset pair.

getPosition(uint256).notice: Retrieves the position information for a given ID.

getPositionByIndex(uint256).notice: Retrieves the position at the specified index.

getPositionDebt(uint256).notice: Returns the debt of a position with the given ID.

getTraderPositionsLength(address).notice: Returns the length of the array containing the positions of a specific trader.

healthPosition(uint256).notice: Retrieves the health value of a position.

increaseDeposit(uint256,uint256,address,.notice: Increases the deposit amount for a given position.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the contract with the specified addresses and initializes inherited contracts.

isDelistedPosition(uint256).notice: Checks if a position with the given ID is delisted.

isPositionRisky(uint256).notice: hecks if the position is risky.

openPositionByOrder((address,(address,ad.notice: Opens a position based on the provided order parameters.

partiallyClosePosition(uint256,uint256,a.notice: Allows the trader to partially close a position.

setDefaultOracleTolerableLimit(uint256).notice: Sets the default oracle tolerable limit for the protocol.

setMaxPositionSize(address,address,uint2.notice: Sets the maximum position size for a pair of tokens.

setMinPositionSize(uint256,address).notice: Sets the minimum position size and the corresponding asset for positions.

setOracleTolerableLimit(address,address,.notice: Sets the oracle tolerable limit between two assets.

setSpotTradingRewardDistributor(address).notice: Sets the address of the SpotTradingRewardDistributor contract.

updatePositionConditions(uint256,(uint25.notice: Updates the position with the given position ID by setting new close conditions.
